name: TruNews
0:
”Alexa, open TruNews.”
”Alexa, ask TruNews to play the latest godcast.”
”Alexa, ask TruNews to play the latest show.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trunews
Developer Terms of Use
des: TruNews is the world’s leading news source that reports, analyzes, and comments on global events and trends with a conservative, orthodox Christian worldview. Our vision is to build a global news network that provides a credible source for worldnews, events, and trends while giving respect and honor to Christians of all major denominations – Evangelical, Orthodox, Anglican, Catholic, and Protestant. We believe Christians need and deserve their own global news network to keep the worldwide Church informed, and to offer Christians a positive alternative to the anti-Christian bigotry of the mainstream news media.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
